channel.title: Master Wand Correctly?
channel.description: I was wondering if anyone could help me with making the master wand hold up straight like in RS. I've seen servers where it is held up right. Right now, it's just sticking out. Thanks

item.title: Master Wand Correctly?
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

no… that makes it up against your shoulder put it in this in client.java
find getstand
add

if(id == 1305 || id == 1379 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 1403 || id == 145 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4675 || id == 4710 || id == 6526 || id == 4726 || id == 6562 || id == 6563 || id == 5730 || id == 15226 || id == 15227 || id == 15228 || id == 15229 || id == 15230 || id == 15231) // staves { return 809; } }
and just put ur thing in with || #####
and scroll up and add this in getwalk

if(id == 4039 || id == 4037 || id == 1379 || id == 3204 || id == 3202 || id == 1381 || id == 1383 || id == 1385 || id == 1387 || id == 1389 || id == 1391 || id == 1393 || id == 1395 || id == 1397 || id == 1399 || id == 1401 || id == 1403 || id == 145 || id == 1407 || id == 1409 || id == 3053 || id == 3054 || id == 4170 || id == 4675 || id == 4710 || id == 6526 || id == 4726 || id == 6562 || id == 6563 || id == 6914 || id == 5730 || id == 13593 || id == 13764 || id == 11967 || id == 11968 || id == 11969 || id == 14558 || id == 14559 || id == 14560 || id == 15226 || id == 15227 || id == 15228 || id == 15229 || id == 15230 || id == 15231) // staves + d long and most other weps with str8 up emote { return 1146; } and just put ur thing in with || #####
return 1146 is another word for ::emote 1146
so you can scroll up change whatever you want for wep animations
